metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12474 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: The AP4_AtomSampleTable::GetSample function in Core/Ap4AtomSampleTable.cpp in Bento4 mp42ts before 1.5.0-616 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted mp4 file.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
